message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I really appreciate it, but $110 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $110 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $105. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll find it's still a fantastic deal!
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $105 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm happy to pay $100 for the product. That's my final offer.

I understand that $105 is still a bit too high for you, Bob, but I'm not willing to go down to $100. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer it to you for $102.50. It's my final offer, and I think it's a great deal for both of us!
